article_title: Paris Is a High Point in Obama’s Environmental Quest
article_text:
For President Barack Obama, the two-week global climate conference in Paris will mark the height of a yearslong quest to curb greenhouse-gas emissions, one that has been far from smooth.

While an international deal appears within reach, the president faces stiff opposition from Republicans in Congress and from more than 20 states that are challenging the power-plant restrictions that form the core of the U.S. promise to reduce...

twitter.description: The U.S. president’s trip to Paris for the COP21 climate conference will mark the height of Mr. Obama’s yearslong quest to curb greenhouse-gas emissions, and one that has been far from smooth.
